title: What are the steps to induce ecstasy and regression using non-verbal communication and Taurus induction?
first_phrase: In this text, the author describes a course on inducing Ecstasy using Taurus and non-verbal hypnosis techniques. The author explains the benefits of Taurus and how it induces deep hypnosis through specific breathing and instructions. They then go on to describe the advanced course, where they add light, passes, and regressions. The author also describes the physiological and Hermetic interpretations of Taurus. The text then moves to Magnetic Circle, where the author explains the objective of creating an egregore and a specific space outside of normal reality. The text then explains Magnetic Ecstasy and its history, use in therapy, and different levels of ecstasy. In the last 200 tokens, the author explains the principal points to create ecstasy and what ecstasy is like, moving on a vertical plane.
content: The more a person will have worked before the higher he will go Physiological interpretation: strong activation of an answer of the dorsal parasympathetic system Hermetic interpretation: developing the "quintessence" for going in a verticality / energy goes up / white phase in alchemy Principal points to work on to create Ecstasy 1 - Bring before the person into the somnambulism using some of the techniques we learnt in the basic course (in this case begin with the technique of LAFONTAINE) 2 - do crossed passes from the right shoulder downward to the left and from the left shoulder downward to the right (in this way the two lines will cross about at the height of the heart) 3 - do Passes from the 3rd eye to the crown 4 (optional) in case put a Hand on shoulder 5 - you can also put both your hands on his head and do as you want lift him 6 - You can also do Movements on the spine 7 (optional) you can also use Music A good music is Moonlight Sonata on Glassharp of Beethoven (look on youtube - very good the interpretation of Robert Tiso) WHAT IS ECSTASY? Ecstasy is like moving on a vertical plane.
last_phrase: In conclusion, these exercises and techniques provide a practical and unique approach to achieving ecstasy and healing the spine. Using techniques such as LaFontaine, crossed and upward passes, and closure of the senses, you can induce a state of magnetism and activate the parasympathetic system. By understanding the power of Proxemics and non-verbal communication, you can guide your clients through the main axes and create solutions to amplify results. Remember to stay neutral and positive to ensure a successful outcome.
